fields.review: These guys have no pizza experience, and they're not in the pizza category. Stay tuned folks, the day of reckoning will come... -Papa John

Brought a girl here on a date, and one of the good-looking waiters made me look like a chump. Fairly sure I saw him trading numbers with her when I came back from the loo. Pizza was fine though, I suppose.
I enjoyed it at the time, but it's now 24 hours later and I think I'm going to die on the toilet. What do they make that pepperoni out of anyway?
Not as good as the Valtellina, but still amazing. Stay away if you can't handle hot stuff though! Gave me a run for my money!
I usually get the Valtellina, but I'm getting into spicy stuff, so I tried this. Very nice, but I think I jumped in at the deep end!
Another winner! Blew my absolute ***s off, but the flavours more than made up for it!
Vegans pushing their vegan agenda down our throats as usual.
Absolutely delicious! But I could've fit a little bit more in despite ordering the biggest size...
Pretty tasty, but not as spicy as they let on.
Too hot for me... I asked them to go easy on the 'penos...
